name: Sea of Vampires
description:
Sea of Vampires is a short game about driving a boat across the Sea of Blood. You have been contracted to deliver medical supplies to Outpost Omega, on the other side of the Sea of Blood.

Under the surface of the Sea of Blood lurk vampiric beasts ready to strike at any moment. They are attracted to light and sound, so run your engines carefully.

This game is an entry for the Mini Jam 118: Vampires game jam.
